code: @Override protected Object invoke(CacheOperationInvocationContext<CacheRemoveOperation> context, CacheOperationInvoker invoker) {     CacheRemoveOperation operation = context.getOperation().     boolean earlyRemove = operation.isEarlyRemove().     if (earlyRemove) {         removeValue(context).     }     try {         Object result = invoker.invoke().         if (!earlyRemove) {             removeValue(context).         }         return result.     } catch (CacheOperationInvoker.ThrowableWrapper wrapperException) {         Throwable ex = wrapperException.getOriginal().         if (!earlyRemove && operation.getExceptionTypeFilter().match(ex.getClass())) {             removeValue(context).         }         throw wrapperException.     } }

private void removeValue(CacheOperationInvocationContext<CacheRemoveOperation> context) {     Object key = generateKey(context).     Cache cache = resolveCache(context).     if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {         logger.trace("Invalidating key [" + key + "] on cache '" + cache.getName() + "' for operation " + context.getOperation()).     }     doEvict(cache, key). }
